verses.roman:
gopī-śobhā dekhi' kṛṣṇera śobhā bāḍhe yata
kṛṣṇa-śobhā dekhi' gopīra śobhā bāḍhe tata

synonyms: gopī-śobhā—the beauty of the gopīs; dekhi'-seeing; kṛṣṇera—of Lord Kṛṣṇa; śobhā—the beauty; bāḍhe—increases; yata—as much as; kṛṣṇa-śobhā—the beauty of Lord Kṛṣṇa; dekhi'-seeing; gopīra—of the gopīs; śobhā—the beauty; bāḍhe—increases; tata—that much.
translation: The beauty of Lord Kṛṣṇa increases at the sight of the beauty of the gopīs. And the more the gopīs see Lord Kṛṣṇa's beauty, the more their beauty increases.
